name: seo-health
description: Comprehensive SEO health analysis focusing on organic search performance

queries.note: Track organic search traffic over 30 days
Top landing pages from organic search
Filter for pages with >50 visitors and >70% bounce in analysis
Compare organic vs other traffic sources

red_flags.insight: Significant organic traffic decline suggests ranking drops or technical SEO issues
Very high organic bounce rate indicates search intent mismatch
Organic traffic should typically be 30-50% of total traffic for healthy SEO

seo_insights.insight: Good keyword diversity and content discoverability

seo_insights.good: < 60% average bounce for top entry pages

seo_insights.insight: Users finding valuable content from search

investigation_triggers.action: Check Google Search Console for ranking drops, technical errors, or manual actions
Review title tags and meta descriptions - may not match search intent
Content may be thin or not matching what users searched for

analysis_approach: Compare organic traffic trends, identify problem landing pages, assess overall SEO health vs other channels, provide actionable recommendations
